channel.title: How do I put wine on centos vps
channel.description:
I have a vps and I cant get wine to go on it. When i go to software center it can not find it. when I do yum install wine it says:
Loaded plugins: fastestmirror Repository 'vz-base' is missing name in configuration, using id Repository 'vz-updates' is missing name in configuration, using id Loading mirror speeds from cached hostfile * base: mirrors.versaweb.com * extras: mirrors.usc.edu * updates: mirrors.200p-sf.sonic.net Setting up Install Process No package wine available. Nothing to do --------------------------------------------------- please help me, keep in mind I know nothing about linux so be very specific.Thanks so much!!!!!

item.title: How do I put wine on centos vps
item.dc:creator: @hgaits hgaits
item.description:
@hgaits wrote:

I have a vps and I cant get wine to go on it.
When i go to software center it can not find it.
when I do yum install wine it says:

Loaded plugins: fastestmirror
Repository ‘vz-base’ is missing name in configuration, using id
Repository ‘vz-updates’ is missing name in configuration, using id
Loading mirror speeds from cached hostfile

  • base: mirrors.versaweb.com
  • extras: mirrors.usc.edu
  • updates: mirrors.200p-sf.sonic.net
    Setting up Install Process
    No package wine available.
    Nothing to do

please help me, keep in mind I know nothing about linux so be very specific.Thanks so much!!!

Read full topic
item.source: How do I put wine on centos vps
